Timings for various impiuts and sample rates.
Where Ovfl is Y then we either are or expect to be dropping samples.
Not all input types provided the ability to detect dropping of samples.

All measured with a remote UI on firefox over wifi unless stated

SOAPY sdrplay  sdrplay_apiServ taking 30%cpu
Pi	Msps	fft		time	proc	ui		read	total	Ovfl	
===================================================================
4	1		256		 256	180		67		161		313		Y
4	1		512		 512	283		97		210		470		Y
4	1		1024	1024	290		88		341		500		Y
4	1		2048	2048	470		140		896		680		N

Local Pi desktop and local browser on Pi
SOAPY SDRPLAY  sdrplay_apiServ taking 30%cpu
Pi	Msps	fft		time	proc	ui		read	total	Ovfl	
===================================================================
4	1.000	16384	16384	5563	1864	6500	8240	Y	Chromium
4	1.000	16384	16384	6227	1727	5500	8772	N	Firefox


	chromium browser taking>50% when UI open but no spectral updates
	100% when updating
